bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXXVIII (Nos 2824-2877) with contributions by M.M. Austin, R.S. Bagnall, D. and M. Crawford, J. Crook, A.H.M. Jones, J. Reynolds, P.A.M. Seuren, J.C. Shelton, R.F. Tannenbaum

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Browne G.M., J.D. Thomas, E.G. Turner and M.E. Weinstein, with contributions by M.M. Austin, R.S. Bagnall, D. and M. Crawford, J. Crook, A.H.M. Jones, J. Reynolds, P.A.M. Seuren, J.C. Shelton, R.F. Tannenbaum, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXXVIII (Nos 2824-2877). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 54.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1971, 8°, xv-123 pp. et VIII pll.

C.R. par Zbigniew Borkowski, JJurP 18 (1974) pp. 268-272. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 41 (1972) pp. 452-453. - Jean Irigoin, REG 85 (1972) pp. 234-235. - Joel B. Lidov, BASP 12 (1975) pp. 127-129. - Wolfgang Luppe, Gnomon 46 (1974) pp. 641-646. - Paul Mertens, BibO 32 (1975) pp. 40-41. - Orsolina Montevecchi, Aegyptus 55 (1975) pp. 291-303 (concerne aussi les volumes XXXIX, XL, XLI et XLII). - Juan Pegueroles, StPap 12 (1973) p. 55. - Eduardo Volterra, Iura 23 (1972) pp. 290-294. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 90 (1973) pp. 372-381 (concerne aussi P. Oxy. XXXVI et XXXVII).
Browne Thomas Turner Weinstein Austin Bagnall Crawford Crook Jones Reynolds Seuren Shelton Tannenbaum
